description:
*** Not yet fully populated ***


As part of an ongoing conversion, historic dialysis information is being transitioned to this new data structure.


Use V_PAT_DIALYSIS_HISTORY to accurately report on all historic and new dialysis data.


This table stores dialysis episodes information.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the dialysis episode record.

columns.name: CONTACT_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The episode type.

columns.name: EPISODE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The episode's status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: Stores the department primarily responsible for managing the episode.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: The episode comments.

columns.name: DIALYSIS_ADMISSION_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the patient's reason for starting dialysis treatment in a facility.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New Dialysis Patient


Transfer In


Restart Dialysis


Dialysis after Transplant Failed


Dialysis in Support of Transplant

columns.name: TRANSIENT_YN
columns.description:
This item is used to indicate whether the patient is receiving temporary treatment at a dialysis facility. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: DIALYSIS_DISCHARGE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the patient's reason for ending dialysis treatment in a facility.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Death


Discontinue


Lost to Follow-Up


Recover Function of Original Kidney


Involuntary


Other


Transplant in US


Transplant outside US


Transfer


Acute


Move to Chronic


Delayed Function Resolved following a Transplant


Delayed Function Unresolved following a Transplant

columns.name: TRANSFER_DESTINATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to store where a patient will be getting dialysis treatment after discharging from the current facility.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Dialysis Facility


Hospice


Hospital


Long Term Care Facility


Rehab Center


Nursing Home

columns.name: TREATMENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to store a patient's type of dialysis treatment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Hemo


Peritoneal


Continuous Arteriovenous Hemofiltration


Continuous Veno-Venous Hemofiltration


Acute-Hemo


Acute-Peritoneal


Continuous Veno-Venous Hemodialysis


Continuous Arteriovenous Hemodialysis


Maintenance (Type Unknown)


In-center Hemodialysis


Home Hemodialysis


Continuous Ambulatory Peritoneal Dialysis


Continuous Cycling Peritoneal Dialysis

columns.name: DIALYSIS_HISTORICAL_EPISODE_YN
columns.description:
This item is used to indicate whether the episode is a historical or external dialysis treatment episode, or an internal dialysis treatment episode. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DIALYSIS_DISCHARGE_OTHR
columns.description: This item stores a free text comment if a patient's dialysis discharge reason is set to Other.

columns.name: DIALYSIS_START_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to store the start date of a patient's dialysis treatment episode.

columns.name: DIALYSIS_END_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to store the end date of a patient's dialysis treatment episode.

columns.name: PLACE_OF_SERVICE_ID
columns.description: The episode's service area.

columns.name: MODALITY_START_DATE
columns.description: This item stores a dialysis patient's start date of their current treatment details.

columns.name: DIALYSIS_EPISODE_PURPOSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the purpose of the dialysis episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Dialysis Tracking


SPoC Pre-Dialysis Tracking

columns.name: NEPH_DLYS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of dialysis. Either end stage renal disease (ESRD) or acute kidney injury (AKI). If null then the episode is assumed to be ESRD.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


End Stage Renal Disease


Acute Kidney Injury

columns.name: NEPH_TRANSIENT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the patient's reason for receiving temporary treatment at a dialysis facility.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Disaster


Travel


Home Maintenance


Facility Maintenance


Dialysis in Support of Transplant


Backup Hemodialysis

columns.name: TREATMENT_SESSIONS_PER_WEEK
columns.description: This item stores the most recently prescribed sessions per week of the dialysis treatments.

columns.name: TREATMENT_DURATION_MINUTES
columns.description: This item stores the most recently prescribed duration of each dialysis treatment in minutes.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_FACILITY_ID
columns.description: This item is used to store a dialysis patient's external treatment facility.
